titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Gertrude Spaulding Bartelme Papers, 1916-1921
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Emma Gronbeck, December 2024.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: This collection contains records and printed ephemera collected by Gertrude (Spaulding) Bartelme (VC 1915) during her service with the American Red Cross Bureau of Refugees in France towards the end of the First World War.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Gertrude (Spaulding) Bartelme graduated from Vassar College in 1915 and served with the American Red Cross abroad in France at the end of the First World War.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection contains records and printed ephemera collected by Gertrude (Spaulding) Bartelme (VC 1915) during her service with the American Red Cross Bureau of Refugees in France towards the end of the First World War.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged alphabetically by file title.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library .

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: American Red Cross Vassar Relief Unit.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Gertrude Spaulding Bartelme Papers, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.
